corpofftitle1: Vice President, Chief Compliance & Audit Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Security & Safety Equipment - (SEC)General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)
personaldata: (1) Employee/Employment Data: off-line, on-line, manually processed data and human resources data; and (2) Corporate Compliance Program Data: off-line, on-line, manually processed data and data relating to customers/vendors/business partners required to comply with the Tyco’s Corporate Compliance Programs, and (3) Customer Relationship Management Data.
recoursemech: Questions or complaints about Tyco’s treatment of personal information will be handled in accordance with the Dispute Resolution Process.  If a matter is not resolved through internal Tyco procedures, then the data subject will be directed to the state or national data protection authority in the jurisdiction where the employee works or the customer, vendor or business partner is located.
